articles.content:
Floral Basket to DPRK Embassy in Equatorial Guinea 
   Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Obiang Nguema Mbasogo, founder and chairman of the Democratic Party and president of Equatorial Guinea, sent a floral basket to the DPRK embassy in his country on Feb. 16 in  congratulation of Kim Jong Il's birthday. The floral basket was laid before the portraits of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il by the delegation of the Democratic Party which paid a congratulatory visit to the embassy.
